option.name: wxNB_TOP
option.help: Place tabs on the top side.

option.name: wxNB_LEFT
option.help: Place tabs on the left side.

option.name: wxNB_RIGHT
option.help: Place tabs on the right side.

option.name: wxNB_BOTTOM
option.help: Place tabs under instead of above the notebook pages.

option.name: wxNB_FIXEDWIDTH
option.help: All tabs will have same width. (Windows only)

option.name: wxNB_MULTILINE
option.help: There can be several rows of tabs. (Windows only)

option.name: wxNB_NOPAGETHEME
option.help: Display a solid colour on notebook pages, and not a gradient, which can reduce performance. (Windows only)

event.name: OnNotebookPageChanged
event.help: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED event.

event.name: OnNotebookPageChanging
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed.

property.name: tab_ctrl_height
property.help: Sets the tab height. By default, the tab control height is calculated by measuring the text height and bitmap sizes on the tab captions. Calling this method will override that calculation and set the tab control to the specified height parameter. A call to this method will override any call to SetUniformBitmapSize(). Specifying -1 as the height will return the control to its default auto-sizing behaviour.

property.name: bitmapsize
property.help: SetUniformBitmapSize() ensures that all tabs will have the same height, even if some tabs don't have bitmaps. Passing wxDefaultSize to this function will instruct the control to use dynamic tab height, which is the default behaviour. Under the default behaviour, when a tab with a large bitmap is added, the tab control's height will automatically increase to accommodate the larger bitmap.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookPageClose
event.help: A page is about to be closed. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CLOSE event.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookPageClosed
event.help: A page has been closed. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CLOSED event.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookPageChanged
event.help: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED event.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookPageChanging
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookButton
event.help: The window list button has been pressed. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_BUTTON event.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookBeginDrag
event.help: Dragging is about to begin. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_BEGIN_DRAG event.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookEndDrag
event.help: Dragging has ended. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_END_DRAG event.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookDragMotion
event.help: Emitted during a drag and drop operation. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_DRAG_MOTION event.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookAllowDND
event.help: Whether to allow a tab to be dropped. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_ALLOW_DND event. This event must be specially allowed.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookDragDone
event.help: Notify that the tab has been dragged. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_DRAG_DONE event.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookTabMiddleDown
event.help: The middle mouse button is pressed on a tab. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_TAB_MIDDLE_DOWN event.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookTabMiddleUp
event.help: The middle mouse button is released on a tab. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_TAB_MIDDLE_UP event.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookTabRightDown
event.help: The right mouse button is pressed on a tab. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_TAB_RIGHT_DOWN event.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookTabRightUp
event.help: The right mouse button is released on a tab. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_TAB_RIGHT_UP event.

event.name: OnAuiNotebookBGDClick
event.help: Double clicked on the tabs background area. Processes a wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_BG_DCLICK event.

event.name: OnListbookPageChanged
event.help: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LISTBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED event.

event.name: OnListbookPageChanging
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LISTBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed.

event.name: OnToolbookPageChanged
event.help: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOLBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED event.

event.name: OnToolbookPageChanging
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOLBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed.

event.name: OnTreebookPageChanged
event.help: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_TREEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED event.

event.name: OnTreebookPageChanging
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_TREEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed.

event.name: OnTreebookNodeCollapsed
event.help: The page node is going to be collapsed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_TREEBOOK_NODE_COLLAPSED event.

event.name: OnTreebookNodeExpanded
event.help: The page node is going to be expanded. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_TREEBOOK_NODE_EXPANDED event.

property.name: depth
property.help: Adds a new child-page to the last top-level page

event.name: OnChoicebookPageChanged
event.help: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_CHOICEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED event.

event.name: OnChoicebookPageChanging
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_CHOICEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed (using wxNotifyEvent::Veto()).

event.name: OnSimplebookPageChanged
event.help: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_BOOKCTRL_PAGE_CHANGED event.

event.name: OnSimplebookPageChanging
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_BOOKCTRL_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed.
